abstract: Catcher Johnny Monell Jr, journeyman minor league catcher whose father's career peaked with New York Mets' AAA organization, is now an off-season free agent for the Mets in Grapefruit League play; he is hoping that spring training will give him a chance at his father's dream, to play for the Mets in Queens.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Monell Jr., a catcher who grew up a Yankees fan, has impressed the Mets this spring and has a chance to make the team, a dream his father once pursued as well.

headline.main: Bronx Son of Yankees Fans Rekindles Father’s Dream With the Mets
headline.print_headline: Bronx Son of Yankees Fans Rekindles Father’s Dream With the Mets
